title: All-State Camp Check-in: Exree Loe
text: Class: 2017Camp attended: Harrisburg (March) Camp Evaluation: Loe was chosen as one of the best defensive backs at the camp. Loe displayed some of the best footwork of any of the defensive backs at the camp and was voted as one of the top performers.Season Report: The Pitt commit has not seen much action from his cornerback position due to teams not wanting to take a chance at going at him. Loe has been very effective for Johnstown as a wide receiver, catching 31 passes for 649 yards (20.9 yards per catch) and seven touchdowns through the first six weeks of the season. Last week, he caught a season high eight passes for 222 yards and one touchdown against Richland. If he doesn't get you defensively, Loe will definitely get you offensively.
